cost_per_square_foot_calculator.title: Cost per Square Foot Calculator
cost_per_square_foot_calculator.description: Calculate property cost per square foot or square meter.
cost_per_square_foot_calculator.total_cost_tooltip: Total price or cost of the property
cost_per_square_foot_calculator.total_area_tooltip: Total square footage or square meterage
cost_per_square_foot_calculator.empty_state: Enter cost and area to calculate price per unit

howItWorks.title: How Does the Cost per Square Foot Calculator Work?
howItWorks.formula: Cost per Unit = Total Price / Total Area
howItWorks.explanation: This calculator divides the property price by its area to give you the cost per square meter or square foot.

steps.name: Step 3
steps.text: Get the cost per area unit

useCases: Comparing prices of properties with different sizes
Evaluating if a price is fair
Negotiating price based on market standards
seoTips: Compare with average prices in the same area
Don't rely on this metric alone for purchase decisions
Larger areas may have lower cost per unit
commonMistakes: Comparing properties in very different areas

faqs.question: Does cost per square foot include everything?
faqs.answer: Usually reflects base price. Finishes and additions may be separate.

faqs.question: Why does cost vary between areas?
faqs.answer: Location, services, demand, and construction quality all affect price.

faqs.question: Which is better for comparison: meter or foot?
faqs.answer: Use the unit prevalent in your area for easier comparison.

home_value_estimator.title: Home Value Estimator
home_value_estimator.description: Estimate your property market value based on various factors.
home_value_estimator.price_per_meter_tooltip: Average price per square meter/foot in the area
home_value_estimator.tip_1: This is a general estimate that may differ from actual market value
home_value_estimator.tip_2: For accurate valuation, consult a professional appraiser
home_value_estimator.tip_3: Local factors and supply/demand affect price
home_value_estimator.tip_4: Compare with similar properties in the area
home_value_estimator.empty_state: Enter property details to estimate value
home_value_estimator.footer_note: This is a rough estimate. Consult an appraiser for accuracy.

howItWorks.title: How Does the Home Value Estimator Work?
howItWorks.formula: Value = (Area × Price per Unit) × Adjustment Factors
howItWorks.explanation: This estimator calculates an approximate value based on area and market price, with adjustments for condition, location, and age.

steps.name: Step 1
steps.text: Enter property area and price per unit in the area

useCases: Getting an initial idea of property value
seoTips: Use recent sales prices in your area
Official appraisal from a professional is more accurate
Location is usually the most important value factor

faqs.question: How accurate is this estimate?
faqs.answer: It's a preliminary estimate only. For accuracy, get an appraisal from a certified appraiser or real estate agent.

faqs.question: What factors affect property value?
faqs.answer: Location, area, condition, age, improvements, nearby schools, and market demand.

faqs.question: How do I find price per unit in my area?
faqs.answer: From recent sales, real estate websites, or asking local real estate agents.

faqs.question: Do improvements add value equal to their cost?
faqs.answer: Not always. Kitchens and bathrooms typically recover 50-80% of their cost.
